title: [Blue Glacier, Mountain Pass]
description: It is difficult to fathom how such a dangerous place can also offer beauty.  However, so it is when an occasional sunbeam peeks through the cloud cover, bathing the ice with rays of light that transform it into dazzling color.

It is difficult to fathom how such a dangerous place can also offer beauty.  However, so it is when an occasional moonbeam peeks through the cloud cover, bathing the ice with rays of moonlight that transform it into soft color.
